case.state: Hello everyone! I heard about this from ~player~ and decided I'd give it a try.
Have no fear, Amy Rose is here!
Hello everybody! ~Player~ invited me to come play this with ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ and I thought it would be fun.
I'm Amy Rose! ~Player~ invited me here, so I thought I'd come and give it a try.
What! Are you me, but from another dimension? Or are you one of those filthy people who want to look like me, but doesn't act like me at all?
You must be me, but from another dimension. I know that my crush Sonic has another version of him, but I didn't think there would be another version of me out there.
(She looks really familiar... although it's been quite a while.)
Is that you, Rouge? Decided you needed some time at a place like this, huh?
Rouge? It's so nice to see you here! Decided you needed somewhere to relax, huh?

Someone else with pink hair? It's not everyday you see two people with pink hair in one place.
You carry around a weapon too? I always carry around my hammer for safety reasons. Just make sure to keep yourself and others safe while we play.
You carry something to protect you around too? I always carry a hammer for my safety. Just make sure to keep everyone here safe.

I wonder how you got those ears. I kept mine, even though I was transformed.
Are you ok? Why do you have that stuff all over your arms?
Oh, hello. It's nice to meet you!
Hello! I'm super excited to be playing with you today!

...Nice try, ~player.ifMale(Sir|Ma'am)~. I guess I'll play along though since you want me to.

I knew that Amy was quite a common name, but I didn't quite expect to see four of us all in the same place.
Mymans... What an interesting name. I really actually like it, but it seems like you've seen Fluttershy a lot more than you've seen me. Are you two really good friends? Or maybe even lovers?
You're Ringo, right? It's been quite a while since we last met. I do look a little different, though that is through no fault of my own. That was Dr Eggman's fault.
I'm not quite sure how a butterfly is going to play this game, but I hope you have as much fun as I plan on having.
The same boots and the same sweater as me? You must really want to take my outfit, ~player~. I'm flattered.
I'm flattered that you would wear the same boots and sweater to the game that I'm wearing, ~player~. It makes me happy that you like my outfit that much.
Taking on my outfit, ~player~? Those boots of yours look really similar to mine.
Did inspire you to wear my boots, ~player~? That pair you have on looks very similar to the pair I have.
Taking on the red sweater look, ~player~? It's a lot like mine, but you look really cute in it!
Wearing a red sweater for yourself, ~player~? It looks like the one I'm wearing, but it really fits you!
You really are the sweetest... I wouldn't mind if you were around me a little more often.
I'm so glad you're playing this with me! You really are the best, you know that right?
I know Rouge is here, but I glad you want to play with me still. Thank you, ANDRW.
I'm glad you and I could share the same space today. Let's have a lot of fun playing together!
Wait... I saw that Rouge was here! Hey, Phonebox? Do happen to know anything about that? I've heard you have a somewhat special relationship with her.
My crush, Sonic, is usually a big reason why we don't go to beaches that often. It's nice that I'll able to soak up some rays while I'm with ~player~ though.
I don't usually get to the beach often, since it's not one of my crush Sonic's favorite places. I'm glad that I could get to spend some time out in the sun with you though, ~player~.
I like the hearts on the wallpaper here. Was this supposed to be your way of telling me you like me, ~player~?
It's kinda cold out here... But the scenery and the candles more than make up for it.
It's kinda cold out here tonight, but the view and the candle light is so romantic...
Hey Nord! Everything going alright today? I just wanted to say that if you're feeling down, everything will be alright, and it'll all be okay. I'll be thinking of you!
Oh, hello Corgi! I hope everything is going okay today! Remember that even if your down, it'll all be worth it, so try to wear that smile as much as you can. Hehe~
Mymans... What an interesting name. You have quite the sweet aura, though, so I don't really mind it. I hope we both enjoy this game together.
I haven't played poker in a while—but let's see what happens!
I'm always down to play a friendly game of poker with everyone!
Poker isn't something I do often, but let's do this!
Let's get this started, I'm ready to play!
Let's do this!
Huh, it looks like I need no cards this time around!
I don't need any this time around.
I'd love to have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Let me have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please!
It would be sweet to have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'm looking for ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will do!
The fortunes are telling me to take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will help me keep pace.
I'll keep up with ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
I guess I'll just take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ looks good to me!
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ this time.
It would be good to have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ right now.
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ to keep me in the running.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ should be alright.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ better help me stay in this fight!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ better help me stay afloat.

~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will do me just fine, I think.
I think I'll do alright with ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will hopefully be alright.
Gonna have to take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ on this one!
I guess I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ this time.
Looks like I'll be taking ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ this time.
This is a pretty good way to start things off.
What a way to start off!
Not gonna hold back on this!
These cards are as fancy as a diamond ring!
Looks like I'll win this round for sure!
Awesome! This is looking great.
I know this is a good hand, but is it enough still?
Looks like you won't get to see any more of me this round, ~player~!
These cards are sweet as apple pie!
This is quite the unique event for me... I wonder if that means I should get out more.
...I hope I'm not boring you too much, ~player~.
I've always wondered if shorts would be better for me. I do travel by foot a lot of the time, so it would be more comfortable.
It may come at some cost to you ~player~, but it looks like I'll be here another round.
Looks like my shopping trip may be delayed a bit at this rate.
Look like I'll be in this fight another round.
This would have been better earlier, but it looks like I'll last at least another round.
I may have exposed myself, but I won't be taking any more soon!
I may have had to take off my bra, but I shouldn't have to show more this round!

It would have been nice to have this while I still had my bra...
(Are these the type of games that my pal Rouge plays at her casino? Has she played strip poker before too?)
I know that Rouge plays Poker sometimes... Maybe I should play with her sometime.
I guess I can manage with this.
Does anyone know of a cute toy shop nearby? I've got to get some toys for my sweet pal Cream after the game.
Not as sweet as a chocolate cheesecake, but it'll do, I guess.
I haven't heard from my buddy Tails for a while...
(Is my boxercise class still on for tomorrow?)

Sometimes, my friend Knuckles likes to come to my boxercise classes. Normally, I don't mind, but it's kinda hard to explain we are friends when he causes damage to the building... or completely destroys it.
I can't remember the last time I didn't have my hammer on me. Gotta stay on your toes.
I may not be great at poker, but I'm at least better than Cream, my pal and sidekick.
The clothes I still have don't leave very much to the imagination, now that I think about it.
This is pretty fun, ~player~. It's pretty relaxing too.
(I might have to prepare something special for dinner tonight after this... Maybe some Parmesan crusted chicken, perhaps?)
It's been a while since I played cards of any kind, let alone poker. Cards aren't something me and the gang keeps back home.
I know my friend Blaze has played poker before, but I wonder how she would handle the stripping kind of poker. Probably not too well...
Looks like the fortunes don't know what to think about this hand.
People looking at me like this... I wouldn't call it cute, but it's still intriguing me in some ways I hadn't expected.
It's a bit embarrassing looking like this, but overall, this game has been a blast!
I know Tails told me to pick something up for him at the mechanics shop, but I can't fully remember what it was...
Sometimes I wish for my crush Sonic to see me like this... but that would be just too embarrassing.
Oh man, I guess this hand could go either way for me, huh.
I've never been seen like this before in front of someone, but it can't be that bad.
(Could I use this game to see more of Sonic... It's not a bad idea.)
Did somebody turn the air conditioning on? It feels like it's getting colder all of a sudden.
Is it just me, or did the air conditioning just turn on? It's starting to feel a little colder in here all of a sudden.
Is it just me, or is it a little cold in here... It's starting to make my nipples hard.
Do you think it's kinda cold in here ~player~? I feel my nipples starting to get harder because of the air.
Oh no...
I'd rather be looking at my tarot cards!
(I might lose this hand, but at least I still have things to take off.)
I may be down on my luck a little... I'll say these cards aren't the best.
What I have on now, it's kinda revealing... Did you want that to happen, ~player~?
I wonder what cards the others have... and if mine are good enough.
These cards are about as burnt out as that lemon meringue pie I tried to make the other day!
(I'm gonna need better cards than this if I want to win...)
(Maybe this wasn't such a good idea...)
At least I still have my hammer around...
Should I spend my time after the game shopping, or should I go out to eat first?
The fates have ignored me once again. First with my crush Sonic, and now this!
Something like this could be a little more enjoyable if it was faster paced, it feels a little slow.
I thought I would be a little more lucky than this... but I'm standing here, exposed and a little nervous.
I've been in some nervous situations, but this feels different.
I've been close to losing before, but usually the stakes aren't this high...
This hand... is gonna be how I go down.
I feel scared about this...
...I should have set up a date with Sonic instead of this.
Looks like it all depends on ~player~ now...
I'm hoping I can pull this out somehow...
I don't play poker as often as my pal Rouge, but even I know this hand isn't great.
(...I knew I should have gone with Rouge and Cream to the mall.)

Wait a second...
That ring wasn't with you a second ago. Are you really stealing from the people here...? I knew you were shifty, but that's low even for you.

Even if I'm well aware that you like to steal, this seems like a bit too risky of a time to be doing so. You don't know what kind of powers the people around here have -- they could notice what you're doing and get angry about it.

I'm not sure where you're getting this stuff from, but it seems your obsession has gotten the better of you.
What'll you steal next? A chaos emerald?

A crown!
You're just going to steal all this stuff like this, huh? Well, I hope you get what's coming to you-- and if no one wants to take that crown off your head, then I'll be the one to do it!

condition.saying: So, now that I can move a bit more freely...
So if I'm going to get down to real business, now's the time…

case.state:
What could you possibly mean by that, Rouge...
Just don't take whatever you're doing too far.
I'm not really sure what you mean by that, but you better not be taking things too far. Disturbing some of the patrons here seems like not the smartest idea.
You don't need to take off your jacket, Komi-san! Your shoes were just fine.
I don't read books often, but one of my favorites is The Notebook. It's such a compelling story of love... and it's twists and turns made it so I couldn't put it down.
I've had a crush on a fellow adventurer, Meia. His name is Sonic. It seems like he doesn't return my feelings though, as he always seems to run away whenever I confess my feelings to him.
Sonic slept with ~SmashGirl~?! I know they see each other for that fighting tournament, but you're telling me he has been seeing them on the side, too?
That was an interesting place. I remember being there to take back Emerl, and it was quite extravagant.
I remember it being really extravagant when I was there to take back Emerl, so maybe I could pay it a visit, on peaceful terms this time.
I definitely don't believe you, but I suppose you could be doing more harm than just taking someone's belongings...
It may be par for the course but it doesn't make it any less immoral of an action, Rouge.
I... haven't made him mine yet, but I'm hoping I can soon. He can be quite... stubborn at times.
I'll be just fine! Sometimes, staying persistent in the face of a negative outcome is the best option. I'll be sure to make him mine some day!
Saving the world? I also have my fair share of experience in that. It's definitely hard work, but me and my friends have probably saved the world hundreds of times by now over the years.
That sure is... a lot. Is there a reason you have so many?
That's sounds like quite a lot. Is there any reason for you having so many?
Well... It does sound fun, but I already have a guy I've fallen in love with.
Meeting new people does sound like fun, but I already have Sonic to fawn over.
But I've always heard that that stuff is bad for you, even if it's just a little bit of it, Polly. I wouldn't want to risk so much over a good time.
Isn't that that stuff bad for you, even if it's only a little bit? My whole life, everyone has told me that even a little bit of that stuff could be really harmful.
I... was too embarrassed at the thought of asking him. Also, I didn't know if doing something like this was his speed.
I... was too embarrassed to ask. I didn't know if this would be his speed, especially if I was the one inviting him.
Are there some things you could tell me so I can help people without having to try them for myself? I want to help people, but when it comes to something like that I don't know where to begin.
Wonderful! Does being around food like that all the time make you want to cook, Ringo?
I would say he's quite dense. I've given him hugs and everything and he still doesn't seem to care to much about my love for him.
I've given him hugs... you would think I'd have gotten his attention, but he's quite the dense hedgehog.
Well... I also used to try to look for him a lot so we could spend time together, but I haven't done that for some time. I wouldn't mind hearing your advice though, Asuna.
I also used to try to look for him so we could spend more time together, but I haven't done that in a while... I wouldn't mind hearing your ideas though, Asuna.
He does hold a special place in my heart, but I understand what you mean, Polly. I'll try to keep an open mind about these types of things.
I see. Thank you for letting me know, Polly. This seems like a serious issue, so I'll try to help however I can.
So you think enough chili dogs would win Sonic over? I know that's his favorite food. He sometimes gives himself a stomachache with how many of those he'll eat.
So chili dogs would be the thing that would win Sonic over? That's his favorite food. He'll sometimes eat so many he gives himself a bellyache.

R-Rouge? There is a difference between clinginess, and just having a sweet, wholesome relationship, you know.
{small}They do go together really well though...{!reset}
I suppose I could buy her more of those Chao plushies she really likes, though she must have a thousand of those by now.
I've always fallen back to those Chao plushies for her if I can't think of anything, but she must have like a thousand of those already.

I thought you were with Shad--
Oh, well then I guess I was wrong about that. Hey, ~player~, If you do end up with Rouge one day, just try not to let her corrupt you too much.

Hey, forget that whole wig... thing. I don't think you would have to do that, ~player~?! I'm just-- focused on someone else right now. It's not like I'm saying I hate you or anything, in fact, we're really great friends.

I'm sorry Rouge...
I've thought about asking you, but I sometimes worried that you wouldn't give me the advice I was looking for.
I want you to get caught in the act, so drawing more attention to you seems like the best way to do it. If you have many set of eyes on you, you can't get away with things as easily, you know.
More attention means you usually can't get away with it as easy, and I do want you to get caught, so you're welcome, I suppose.
Pretty ironic coming from the same one who stares at loads of jewels all day. It may have been a while since we last met, but I can only guess the collection of yours has only gotten bigger.
That's pretty contradictory coming from the same one who could stare at jewels all day. I know it's been a while since we last met, but I can assume that collection has only gotten bigger since then.
Sometimes, the fight is not always about winning, but returning stolen items to their rightful owner!
Sometimes, the fight is not about destroying the enemy, but returning the items they stole to their rightful owner!
I guess I understand... Though do you have any words of advice for me about love, now that it's out in the open like this?
I guess that makes sense... Though it wouldn't hurt to ask you for advice on love now that it's out in the open like this.
Well, if business and pleasure don't mix for him, then have you thought about separating the two? Try to meet him on his free time a few times... You never know what might happen then.

If he doesn't like to have fun while on business, then why don't you try to take the business out of the equation. Meet him the next time you both have free time... You never know what might happen then.
Well, maybe a thousand was a little bit of an over-exaggeration, but she does have more of those things than anyone would know what to do with.
That's pretty smart, Leonie. I always plan my shopping trips in advance, although they usually take a little longer than I think they will.
That's smart, Leonie. I like to plan my shopping trips, but they usually take longer than I expect them to.
I think one of the best things about shopping is doing it with people you can talk with. It makes it all the more enjoyable!
I'm not really sure myself, Leonie. I've heard that it goes somewhere called Hammerspace, although I'm not sure where that is.
I'm actually not sure, Leonie. I've heard it goes somewhere called Hammerspace, but I'm not sure where it is or how I can retrieve it from there.
I don't know if I'd be in to that, but I'm sure my buddy Tails would be. He's quite good at mechanics and putting things together.
While I agree that speed is important, I think slowing down and spending time with friends is just as important.
I agree Miko, but sometimes you have to destress from a hectic lifestyle. I like to do that by going shopping, sometimes by myself, other times with friends.
It's good that you go shopping for your crew mates, Nami. When I'm out, I sometimes grab things for my friends. Some days it's food, other times things to help with our latest projects.
I have been, Ayano... There is someone back home I've loved for quite a long time now. His name is Sonic... Sonic the Hedgehog.
I'm not sure why you would have to raid outlets for clothes, but I guess it's the memories you made along the way that count the most.
Chemistry Kits? I'm not sure why you would need those... but I impress boys by buying them things they like. For example, Chili Dogs are something that Sonic always enjoys.
I'm not sure why you would need chemistry kits... but I impress boys by getting them things they enjoy. For example, Chili Dogs are something that wins Sonic over most days.
I'm not the fastest reader, but it only took me a couple days. I just couldn't put it down! It was so good.
I'm not a fast reader, but I finished it in a couple days. I couldn't put it down! It was such a good story.
I'm not sure how it really works, but my hammer is able to appear and disappear at my command because a phenomenon called "Hammerspace". It's quite useful for me, but I've never really understood it.
I'm never understood why, but my hammer can appear and disappear to somewhere called "Hammerspace". It's useful, but I've never truly been able to wrap my head around it.
I could read your fortune after the game if you really want me to, Polly. It wouldn't take too long either.
I don't go to very many parties, Polly. I usually don't have the time, but even when I do, I don't usually engage in that type of mingling.
I don't actually go to vary many parties, Polly. I don't have a lot a lot of time, and even when I do I'm not usually found in large crowds like that.
No way, Polly! I'd want to do something like that fair and square. Besides, that kind of stuff is very unhealthy for your body.
I wouldn't accept that stuff even if it granted all the wishes in the world, Polly. Stuff like that is extremely harmful to the human body, even lethal if used too much.
Isn't it so much fun--- Wait, wives? What do you mean by that?
Isn't it such fun--- Wait, what do you mean by wives?
You can say that sometimes it's for hobby projects, but most of time it's parts for devices to help stop Dr. Eggman and his evil empire from taking over the world.
It might be for projects sometimes... but most of the time it's parts for a device that will help stop Dr. Eggman and his evil empire from taking over the world.
Competitions? What are you competing in? What are you competing for?
You go on adventures too? What are your adventures for?
I don't remember learning that about you, Ringo. What kind of store do your parents run?
It may not have worked out yet, but I know I can make him mine with enough patience!
It may not have worked out for me yet, but give it enough time and he'll surely be mine one day.
It doesn't sound like my thing... Although I'm not one to steal things for fun. That's something that Dr. Eggman does pretty often, and it sometimes can be a headache trying to get that stuff back.

Well, Dr. Eggman is a scientist who wants to take over the world and build his own Eggman Empire in its place. Most of the time Sonic is able to use his speed to defeat him, but some of his plans have been better than others.
Well, she wouldn't be allowed here. Sometimes we play cards with her back home using candy to bet with though.

condition.saying: I love going shopping...unfortunately, my wallet doesn't.

case.state: I... can't say I relate. Ever since I started adventuring, I've been able to collect more rings than I know what to do with.
I'm glad you like to shop, Lyralei! Is there anything thing in particular that you like to buy?
It's nice to have another person around who enjoys shopping, Lyralei. Is there anything in particular that you like to look for while you shop?
I can understand that. I didn't have very much money myself when I was younger. If you did have money, would there be something you would want to buy?
It is kinda hard knowing that he isn't with me, but at least we're friends...
We aren't as close as I'd want to be, but at least we're friends...
That's nice, Asuna. Is there anything you look for when you go out with them?
I know Sonic likes chili dogs... but my favorite food is ice cream. Maybe you could try them both, but maybe not at the same time.
I understand that, but there has to be more the just a friendship here if he's kept me around this long, right?
That makes sense, but there has to be at least something between us if he has kept me around this long, right?
It nice to spend that kind of time with a friend of yours, Fina. When you go to the weapon stores though, is there anything you're looking for in particular?
You know me too well, Rouge. Any intel on a certain hedgehog, with blue hair?
Secrets, you say? Is he seeing any other girls? Is he planning his next date with me? I have to know.
A chance to get secrets about Sonic? No way I'd pass this up. Do you have anything about his relationship with me?
I know less about jewels than you do, so I can't really help you there. Nor do I really want to, since you'd just take them for yourself anyway.
I know that you know more about jewels than I do, so I can't really help you. Not that I would even if I did know, since you would just take them for yourself.
If I had to choose one, I'd go with a beautiful, red ruby. It's romantic, yet sexy enough to get a good point across.
I think I'd go with a shiny, red ruby. It's quite romantic, yet it stands out enough to get a point across to someone.
Has Shadow ever tried boxercise? It could be a good way to help him release has anger, and I'd even train him too.
Do you think Shadow could be into boxercise? I think it would be a good way to help him release some stress, and I'd even be willing to train him too.
You haven't been to a mall before? Well, it's kinda like an outdoor marketplace, except indoors, and you can get food there too.
Spending time with your friends is the best part of shopping, you get to learn their interests more when you shop together.
Sonic is a great name, at least I think. Also, if you count saving the world multiple times as no reason, then I guess you'd be right, even if you do think that, he has a certain charm to him.

Sonic is a fine name, I think. Also, you're right about him being a doofus, if you count saving the world multiple time as nothing at all. Even if you do think that, there is still a certain charm to him.
Well, I didn't say that couldn't change. But I don't really see it changing at least for now.
Well, I didn't say that couldn't change... I'll just have to see how the future with me and ~player~ goes.
Sounds like fun, and he'd be able to takes his mind off of things while he trained, too.
I may not be as strong as him, but it would be cool to teach him something new. He would able to get the hang it pretty easily, too.
Well, boxercise does work up a sweat, but I'm guessing you're thinking of a different activity when you say that. I'll just say that Shadow is not really my type, Rouge.
I don't think I have... Would I know anyone else that knows about her? Maybe Topaz would know something more?
Sally... the lucky woman. Though the other one could be one of the princesses Mario knows. If I had to guess, I'd go with Daisy, she seems the most like Sally, at least personality wise.
Well, I'll just have to show him that I'm the right one for him, then. It may be a little bit of an uphill battle, but I'm sure I'm up for the job.
Not bad... Long enough to definitely give me enough pleasure, but also not too long either.

I should've known... There was a period of time where she seemed especially happy to be around him. He's always shrugged it off when I asked about it, but I figured the truth was down there somewhere.
I've never even thought about that before. I think I'd need to get used to it, but I'd be up for it if he likes it.
Those colors specifically? I know that he knows people that have that color hair, but could it be connected? That's an interesting thought...
Have you tried to invite him somewhere private before, Rouge? He may have his difficulties with people, but maybe you could get your thoughts into that head of his with some time alone together.
I know he's the type to have problems with people, so have you tried asking him to meet you alone, Rouge? You may be able to slip some of your thoughts into that head of his that way.
Oh come on, Rouge. I have plenty of stuff planned for me and Sonic, it's just that none of it has happened just yet. He'll be going on date with me sooner or later though.
I suppose I don't mean to be desperate, but I just find him so handsome... I suppose that advice makes sense though.
I see... so cater to how he would want to be treated. Seems reasonable enough, I suppose it shouldn't be too tough.
Well... I do have a pretty good chili dog dog recipe, but I can definitely work more to make it even better.
Does anyone here go shopping a lot? It's always been a pastime of mine to go do some shopping at a mall, alone or with friends.

condition.saying: (screams in hedgehog)

state.text: What does that even mean? No one would ever say that. Even if you are trying to cosplay me, you're doing such a bad job that I'm going to call you "Faker" from now on.

case.state: ~Player~, I know you invited me here, but I have to be honest. My true crush is Sonic. He means so much to me... but my feelings don't seem to be returned.
~Player~ do you have any advice for establishing a relationship with someone? I've had a crush on Sonic for quite a long time now... but he doesn't seem to return my feelings.
I'm not sure who put up this wallpaper, but I really like it! The hearts are super cute.
This wallpaper is super cute! I really like the hearts on it, they remind me of myself a little.
This is quite the comfy place for a game like this. We could climb in bed if we wanted to!
